common.modifyInstructions: You can modify the transaction details using the **Advanced** tab below. Once you are satisfied with the details, please click **Sign Transaction** to confirm the transaction with your ledger device.

Metamask.title: Waiting for MetaMask Transaction Confirmation
Metamask.description: Please confirm your transaction in MetaMask. If you wish to cancel, click the 'Reject' button in MetaMask.

errors.settingsError: Please use Chrome, Opera or Firefox with a U2F extension. After connecting your Ledger, open the Ethereum app and make sure **Contract Data** is enabled in **Settings**.

outdatedVersion.title: Your Ethereum App is outdated!
outdatedVersion.instructions: The Ethereum app on your Ledger is not updated. Please update its version to at least **v{{version}}**, and make sure your device firmware is the latest version. Refer [here]({{link}}) for more information.

Trezor.instructions: Please follow instructions on your Trezor Wallet

Json.instructions: Enter your password to sign your transaction

dashboard.title: Projects
dashboard.noProjects: There are no projects to show.

SetUsername.title: Assign Username
SetUsername.warning: You can only assign a username to yourself **ONCE**
SetUsername.instructions: Please enter your desired user name

Errors.invalid: Username must be between 2-20 characters, can only be composed of alphanumeric and underscore characters, and must not begin with the word 'user'.
Errors.connectionError: Unable to update username. Please try again.

SetEmail.title: Set Email
SetEmail.instructions: Please enter the email you want to link to your address

Errors.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
Errors.unchanged: Please enter an email address that is different from your current email.
Errors.connectionError: Unable to update email. Please try again.

Submit.success: KYC submitted. Request is pending approval.

resubmit.title: Re-submit KYC
resubmit.description: Please contact us via our Zendesk widget for enquiries about changing your KYC information.

OpenKycForm.instructions: The objective of this process is to prevent Digix from being used intentionally or unintentionally, by criminal elements for money laundering activities. Related procedures also enable us to better understand our community and their financial dealings. It helps us manage our risks prudently.

date.format: Please enter a valid date in the format yyyy-mm-dd.
date.isAdult: Must be at least 18 years old.
date.fromFuture: Date must be set in the future.

file.isImage: 照片格式必须为 JPEG 或 PNG
file.isValid: Image must be in JPEG, PNG, or PDF format
file.size: Filesize must be less than 10 MB.

Labels.file: File must be in JPEG, PNG, or PDF format & filesize must be less than 10MB.
Labels.image: File must be in JPEG, PNG format & filesize must be less than 10MB.

upload.instructions: Write the above code on a piece of paper and show it to the webcam along with your face and your identification document.

instructions.allowActivation: Please allow activation of your webcam. Once you allow access, you may need to refresh in order to proceed. You will also be asked to write down a verification code on a piece of paper. Please have a paper and pen handy.
instructions.continueOnPreview: Only continue when you can see the preview above.
instructions.uploadAlternative: If you do not have a webcam or are unable to see the preview after granting permission, you will have the option of uploading an image instead.
instructions.includeVerificationCode: Write the above code on a piece of paper and show it to the webcam along with your face and your identification document.

ModeratorRequirements.hint: To gain moderator status, you will need another

introOverlay.title: Hello there!
introOverlay.instructions: You will need to load a wallet and lock some DGD in before you can browse projects and vote in DigixDAO.

banned.title: DigixDAO isn't available in your country yet
banned.description: You don't have permission to view this page.
banned.details: Please contact us via the Help button below for any enquiries.

Name.title: Load Metamask Wallet
Name.instructions: MetaMask is a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today. It allows you to run Ethereum dApps right in your browser without running a full Ethereum node.
Name.name: Name

ConnectionError.noMetamask: Cannot connect to MetaMask wallet. Make sure to login to your MetaMask wallet.

proofOfControl.instructions: Please confirm your signature in MetaMask. If you wish to cancel, click the 'Cancel' button in MetaMask.

chooseAddress.title: Load Ledger Wallet
chooseAddress.description: Ethereum hardware wallet, based on robust safety features for storing cryptographic assets and securing digital payments. It connects to any computer via USB.

outdatedVersion.title: Your Ethereum App is outdated!
outdatedVersion.instructions: The Ethereum app on your Ledger is not updated. Please update its version to at least **v{{version}}**, and make sure your device firmware is the latest version. Refer [here]({{link}}) for more information.

chooseAddress.title: Load Trezor Wallet
chooseAddress.description: Trezor is a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today. It allows you to run Ethereum dApps right in your browser without running a full Ethereum node.

proofOfControl.instructions: Trezor Popup window is loading. Please follow instructions from the popup and your Trezor Wallet to continue.

Json.title: Import Wallet
Json.unlockInstructions: Enter your password to unlock your wallet
Json.signInstructions: Enter your password to sign message
Json.error: Key derivation failed - possibly wrong passphrase

proofOfControl.description: This signing is to prove to our server that you are in control of the Ethereum account that was loaded. By signing this message, you are proving that you control the selected account for use on DigixDAO.

Json.importInstructions: Click or drag and drop here to load your file.

lockDgd.title: Lock DGD
lockDgd.description: Locking your DGD in DigixDAO helps us know you are committed to the growth of the community and of course gives you voting power on the projects you love to support.

notes.title: Note:
notes.note1: DO NOT use a wallet for which you do not have access to the private key.
notes.note2: Please note that your wallet needs to hold ETH to pay for gas transaction costs.
notes.note3: Your locked DGD cannot be traded. You will not be able to see the balance of your locked DGD in your wallet. Locked DGD are only visible on this interface as long as your wallet is connected.
notes.note4: You can lock more (other) DGD anytime.

createErrors.invalidNames: You must provide a name for all addresses.

project.title: Project Details
project.uploadImageButtonHelpText: Image must be in PDF, JPEG or PNG format & file size must be lesser than 10mb.
project.rewardExpectedPlaceholder: Insert the amount of reward expected in ETH for completion of project
project.milestonePlaceholder: Insert amount of fund expected in ETH for completion of milestone
project.milestoneDescriptionPlaceholder: Explain what will be in this milestone
project.noComments: There are no comments to show
project.editFundingError: Sum of Reward Expected and Milestone Fundings must not exceed {{limit}} ETH
project.noShortDescription: No short description content has been created yet.
project.banned: You have been banned by the administrators from commenting.
project.pleaseContact: Please contact Digix if you want to request a restoration of your account rights.

spinner.hold: Hold tight while your project is being uploaded to IPFS.

overlays.modertorVoteDescription: Approval from moderators is needed in order to move a draft to the project stage. Please make your vote here if you’re in approval for the draft.
overlays.claimApprovalDescription: Please note that there was a high volume of users who participated in this approval. As such, we have to split this claim into
overlays.DlJsonHeader: This Json files is only valid for this commit
overlays.DlJsonDescription: In the case you change your mind or make another commit, this file is no longer valid.
overlays.revealVoteDescription:
The Reveal phase is to verify the choice you made in the Commit phase. Please upload the JSON file that you received in the Commit phase. Your choice will then be verified and counted in as a vote.
Please note that if this step is not carried out, your vote will be voided and will not be counted.
overlays.yourVoteIsOnlyValid: Your vote is only valid and counted as activity on the DigixDAO after your confirmation.
overlays.hasVoted: You have already committed for this proposal. This action will overwrite the previous commit.
overlays.commitVoteDescription: In the DigixDAO, we employ the Commit and Reveal scheme to keep your votes as unbiased as possible. You will need to download a JSON file when deciding your in the vote. Your choice will then be verified in the Reveal phase when you upload the same JSON file.
overlays.commitVoteNote: *Please keep the file in a safe place as you will not be able to download it again.*
overlays.invalidFile: Invalid File Content, Please make sure you uploaded the correct file.
overlays.milestoneFundExceeds: Sum of Reward Expected and Milestone Fundings must not exceed {{limit}} ETH

votingResult.timeLeftToCommit: Time Left to End of Commit

alerts.failedModeratorVoting: Your project fails the voting, either by voting results or its already past the deadline for claiming voting results. Please click the button below to claim your failed project and get back your collateral.
alerts.claimModeratorApproval: The voting result shows that your project passes the voting. Please click the button to send transaction(s) to claim this result on the blockchain. You need to do this action before {{dateTime}}, or your project will auto fail.
alerts.claimVotingresult: The voting result shows that your project passes the voting. Please click the button to send transaction(s) to claim this result on the blockchain. You need to do this action before {{dateTime}}, or your project will auto fail.
alerts.prl: This project can no longer claim funding due to Policy, Regulatory or Legal reasons, even if voting passes. Please contact us if you have any queries.
alerts.unclaimed: The voting result was not claimed before the claiming deadline. This project will beauto failed.
alerts.failedVoting: Your project fails the voting, either by voting results or its already past the deadline for claiming voting results.

errors.invalidLink: Invalid link. Hyperlinks may only begin with **http://** or **https://** or **mailto:**

blockedByPRL.title: Funding Is Stopped by PRL
blockedByPRL.description: The project funding has been stopped due to Policy, Regulatory or Legal reasons.
blockedByPRL.details: Please contact us if you have any enquiries.

invalidKyc.title: KYC Is Not Valid
invalidKyc.description: It looks like you don't have a valid KYC yet. You can check your KYC status in the Profile tab.
invalidKyc.details: Let's try again when your KYC has been approved.

inLockingPhase.title: Not Main Phase Yet!
inLockingPhase.description: Looks like it's still the Locking phase now. You need to wait until the Main phase to do any governance activity.
inLockingPhase.details: Let's try again when it's the Main phase again.

insufficientCollateral.title: Not Enough Collateral!
insufficientCollateral.description: It looks like there is insufficient ETH in your wallet. You will need {{requiredCollateral}} ETH for your project as collateral.
insufficientCollateral.details: Let's try again when you have enough ETH.

maintenance.title: Sorry, we're down for maintenance.
maintenance.description: We'll be back shortly. Thank you for your patience.

confirmParticipation.title: Confirming Participation For New Quarter
confirmParticipation.instructions: In order to continue participating in the new quarter, we need you to sign a transaction confirming the amount of stake you have on the platform. If you want to keep the same amount of locked DGDs, you will need to unlock some and lock back the same amount.

options.lockDgd: I want to lock more DGD
options.continueCurrentLockup: I want to continue with my current lock-up of DGD
options.unlockDgd: I want to unlock some DGD

comment.banned: You have been banned by the administrators from commenting.
comment.pleaseContact: Please contact Digix if you want to request a restoration of your account rights.

Empty.title: Transaction Empty
Empty.description: Looks like there are no transactions at the moment. Please lock your DGD to continue.

LockedDgd.title: Your Locked DGD
LockedDgd.instructions: You can lock more DGD to increase your voting power or unlock after a quarter to move your DGD back into your wallet.

UnlockDgd.title: Unlock DGD
UnlockDgd.instructions: Please enter the amount of DGD you wish to unlock:

Hints.fillMax: You will no longer continue to be a participant.
Hints.normal: This will leave you with **{{stake}} STAKE**.
Hints.overfilled: You can only unlock up to {{maxAmount}} DGD.

UnlockDgd.txnSuccess: Your Unlock DGD Transaction is pending confirmation. See More

warning.unlock: Please note that once you lock, you can only unlock your DGDs during the **Locking Phase**.

Hints.overfilled: Cannot lock more than your balance ({{balance}} DGD).
Hints.maxStake: You can only stake up to {{maxAllowance}} DGDs

ParticipationReward.title: DigixDAO Participation Reward
ParticipationReward.instructions: You can claim rewards from actively participating in the DigixDAO during a quarter.

transaction.title: Approve Interaction
transaction.txnSuccess: Your DGD Approval Transaction is pending confirmation. See More

lockDgd.title: Lock DGD

warning.currentPhaseLocking: You are now locking DGD in the **Locking Phase**.
warning.currentPhaseMain: You are now locking DGD in the **Main Phase**.
warning.unlock: Please note that once you locked, you can only unlock your DGDs in a **Locking Phase**.

lockDgd.instructions: Please enter the amount of DGD you wish to lock in:
lockDgd.stake: This will give you **{{stake}} STAKE** in DigixDAO.
lockDgd.txnSuccess: Your Lock DGD transaction is pending confirmation. See more
lockDgd.dgdApprovalSuccess: Your DGD Approval/Lock DGD transaction is pending confirmation. Please wait a while for it to be processed on the blockchain.

approveInteraction.title: Enabling Your DGD For Use
approveInteraction.instructions: In order to participate in DigixDAO, we need your approval in order for our contracts to interact with your DGD.
